name: Random Geek (@randomgeek@hackers.town)
summary:
@www.jvt.me@www.jvt.me Same issue on an even bigger scale!

I'm looking at ways to merge my public PKM notes into my site, and I'm toying with different Hugo solutions like [Related Content](https://gohugo.io/content-management/related/) and a backlinks template. Have you looked into either for your site?
